SELECT ac.id, ac.account, ac.obj_type, ac.obj_code, ac.obj_name, ac.fund_account AS fundAccount FROM t_account ac INNER JOIN t_fund_account fund ON fund.bank_account_no = ac.fund_account INNER JOIN t_merchant_info merinfo ON merinfo.account = ac.account WHERE ac.`status` = '1' and merinfo.status = '1' AND ( ac.obj_type = '3' OR ac.obj_type = '8' ) AND LENGTH( merinfo.id_code ) > 0 AND LENGTH( merinfo.telephone ) > 0 AND ac.bank_client_no IS NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT ac.id, ac.account, ac.obj_type, ac.obj_code, ac.obj_name, ac.fund_account AS fundAccount FROM t_account ac INNER JOIN t_fund_account fund ON fund.bank_account_no = ac.fund_account INNER JOIN t_merchant_info merinfo ON merinfo.account = ac.account WHERE ac.`status` = '1' and ( merinfo.status = '1' or merinfo.status = '2' ) AND ((ac.obj_type = '2' and merinfo.auth_status = 1) or (ac.obj_type = '7' and merinfo.auth_status = 1)) AND LENGTH( merinfo.bus_lic_code ) > 0 AND LENGTH( merinfo.telephone ) > 0 AND ac.bank_client_no IS NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT ac.id, ac.account, ac.obj_type, ac.obj_code, ac.obj_name, ac.fund_account AS fundAccount FROM t_account ac INNER JOIN t_industry ind ON ind.account = ac.account INNER JOIN t_fund_account fund ON fund.bank_account_no = ac.fund_account WHERE ac.`status` = '1' and ind.status = '1' AND ac.obj_type = '1' AND LENGTH( ind.bus_lic_code ) > 0 AND LENGTH( ind.phone ) >0 AND ac.bank_client_no IS NULL

select t.industry_code,t.account,a.obj_type,a.obj_code,a.obj_name,a.balance,a.avail_amount,a.frozen_amount,a.status,a.version from t_merchant_info t left join t_account a on t.account=a.account where t.industry_code = #{industryCode}
